title: mbar to psi Converter – millibar to psi & pressure units

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: psi = mbar × 0.0145037738 This comes from: 1 mbar = 100 Pa, 1 psi = 6894.757 Pa, so 1 mbar = 100 / 6894.757 psi ≈ 0.0145037738 psi.
